displayName.japanese: ハッシュ

description.english: During overtime score 40 flawless notes in a row in an online match
description.french: Réussir 40 notes impeccables d'affilée pendant les prolongations d'une partie en ligne
description.italian: Durante il tempo extra, ottieni 40 note Impeccabili di fila in una partita online
description.german: Erziele in der Verlängerung eines Online-Matches 40 einwandfreie Noten hintereinander
description.spanish: Durante el tiempo extra, puntúa 40 notas impecables seguidas en una partida online.
description.brazilian: Durante a prorrogação, consiga 40 notas impecáveis de forma consecutiva em uma partida online.
description.japanese: 延長戦の間に、オンラインマッチでミス無しの音符を40連続でスコアする
description.schinese: 在一场在线对局加时赛期间，连续在40个音符上斩获无懈可击得分
description.tchinese: 在線上加時賽，連續 40 個音符獲得無懈可擊
description.koreana: 온라인 경기에서 추가 시간에 40연속 무결점 노트 득점
description.russian: Во время сетевого матча получи оценку «Безупречно» 40 раз подряд в течение добавочного времени.

displayName.japanese: 天国への階段

description.english: Win over 100 online matches
description.french: Gagner plus de 100 parties en ligne
description.italian: Vinci più di 100 partite online
description.german: Gewinne über 100 Online-Matches
description.spanish: Gana más de 100 partidas online.
description.brazilian: Vença mais de 100 partidas online.
description.japanese: オンラインマッチで100勝以上する
description.schinese: 赢得超过100场在线对局
description.tchinese: 線上比賽獲勝逾 100 場
description.russian: Одержи победу более чем в 100 сетевых матчах.

displayName.japanese: 虚無へ

description.english: Reach over 200 Combo Streak
description.french: Faire une série de plus de 200 combos
description.italian: Raggiungi una serie di combinazioni superiore a 200
description.german: Erreiche eine Komboserie von über 200
description.spanish: Alcanza una racha de combo de más de 200.
description.brazilian: Alcance uma Sequência de Combos maior que 200.
description.japanese: 200以上の連続コンボを出す
description.schinese: 达成超过200的连击数
description.tchinese: 打出逾 200 個連擊
description.russian: Выполни комбо трюков из более чем 200 элементов.

displayName.japanese: アイルビーバッチ

description.english: Deal over 50 damage in less than 8 seconds as Johann in an online match
description.french: Infliger plus de 50 points de dégâts en moins de 8 secondes avec Johann dans une partie en ligne
description.italian: Infliggi oltre 50 danni in meno di 8 secondi nei panni di Johann in una partita online
description.german: Verursache als Johann in einem Online-Match über 50 Schaden in unter 8 Sekunden
description.spanish: Como Johann, inflige más de 50 puntos de daño en menos de 8 segundos en una partida online.
description.brazilian: Cause mais de 50 de dano em menos de 8 segundos com o Johann em uma partida online.
description.japanese: オンラインマッチでヨハンとして、8秒以内に50以上のダメージを与える
description.schinese: 在一场在线对局中，作为约翰在不到8秒内造成超过50点伤害
description.tchinese: 在線上比賽中，以約翰在 8 秒內造成逾 50 點傷害
description.koreana: 온라인 경기에서 요한으로 8초 안에 대미지 50 넘게 가함
description.russian: Играя за Иоганна в сетевом матче, нанеси более 50 ед. урона меньше чем за 8 секунд.

displayName.japanese: 徳のいざない
